mn108:11.1: garuṃ karotha → garukarotha (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed) | garuṃ katvā → garukatvā (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed)
mn108:15.2: dhātā → dhatā (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed) | sātthaṃ, sabyañjanaṃ → sātthā sabyañjanā (bj, sya-all, km)
mn108:18.1: tirokuṭṭaṃ → tirokuḍḍaṃ (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed) | parimasati → parāmasati (mr)
mn108:24.2: maññati bhavaṃ senāpati → maññasi bhavaṃ senāpati (bj, mr); maññasi evaṃ senāpati (sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed)
